definition[0]: to decide what group something belongs to
example[0]: Families are classified according to the father’s occupation.
example[1]: In law, beer is classified as a food product.
definition[1]: to regard people or things as belonging to a particular group because they have similar qualities
example[3]: As a musician, Cage is hard to classify.
definition[2]: to state officially that something belongs to a particular group or type
example[4]: a substance that is officially classified as hazardous
